name: 網路上隨便找的
code:
import pandas as pd

class Strategy:
    def __init__(self, data):
        self.data = data
        self.stop_loss = 0.02
        self.take_profit = 0.04

    def generate_signals(self):
        signals = pd.Series(0, index=self.data.index)
        ma5 = self.data['MA5']
        ma20 = self.data['MA20']

        long_condition = (ma5 > ma20) & (ma5.shift(1) <= ma20.shift(1))
        short_condition = (ma5 < ma20) & (ma5.shift(1) >= ma20.shift(1))

        signals[long_condition] = 1
        signals[short_condition] = -1

        # Implement stop loss and take profit outside the signal generation
        # This is because backtesting frameworks usually handle order execution and position management.
        # The signals only indicate the initial entry direction.

        return signals
